- Data quality assurance frameworks
- Training for your technical team

## Frequently Asked Questions

::: faq-section
**Do you work with clients outside Kenya?**

Yes! While we're based in Kenya with deep expertise in Kenyan environmental regulations, we work with clients globally. Our R programming and analytical expertise is applicable anywhere.

**What size organizations do you work with?**

We work with organizations of all sizes‚Äîfrom individual consultants and NGOs to government agencies and large corporations. Our boutique approach means we provide senior-level attention regardless of project size.

**Can you help with urgent/short-deadline projects?**

We'll always be honest about what's feasible. Contact us to discuss your timeline and we'll let you know if we can help or suggest alternatives.

**Do you provide ongoing support after project completion?**

Yes! We offer maintenance retainers and can provide ongoing support as needed. We want your solutions to remain valuable long-term.

**How do you ensure data confidentiality?**

We treat all client data with strict confidentiality, use secure communication channels, can sign NDAs, and follow data protection best practices.
:::
